form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Lee (for himself, Mr. Rubio, Mr. McCain, Mr. Perdue, Mr. Cruz, Mr. Johnson, Mr. Cotton, Mr. Cornyn, Mr. Alexander, and Mr. Scott) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: To repeal the wage rate requirements of the Davis-Bacon Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Davis-Bacon Repeal Act.

subsection.text: Subchapter IV of chapter 31 of title 40, United States Code, is repealed.
Any reference in any law to a wage requirement of subchapter IV of chapter 31 of title 40, United States Code, shall be null and void.
